oracle.adf.share.el
Interface ADFExpressionEvaluator

All Known Implementing Classes:
JSPExpressionEvaluatorImpl, OracleExpressionEvaluatorImpl
public interface ADFExpressionEvaluator

          Evaluates the specified value expression against the evaluator's defaul variable resolver.

Method Detail

evaluate

java.lang.Object evaluate(java.lang.String expression)
Evaluates the specified value expression against the evaluator's defaul variable resolver.

invokeMethod(String, Object[]) should be used if the expression is a method expression.

Throws:
javax.el.PropertyNotFoundException - some implementations may throw a PropertyNotFoundException if one of the EL properties is not found.

evaluate

java.lang.Object evaluate(java.lang.String expression,
                          javax.servlet.jsp.el.VariableResolver variableResolver)
Evaluates the specified value expression against the specified variable resolver.

invokeMethod(String, Class[], Object[]) should be used if the expression is a method expression.

Throws:
javax.el.PropertyNotFoundException - some implementations may throw a PropertyNotFoundException if one of the EL properties is not found.

evaluateHandleNull

java.lang.Object evaluateHandleNull(java.lang.String expression)
Evaluates the specified value expression against the evaluator's defaul variable resolver.

invokeMethod(String, Object[]) should be used if the expression is a method expression.

Differs from evaluate in that it is guaranteed not to throw a PropertyNotFoundException for null properties.

evaluateHandleNull

java.lang.Object evaluateHandleNull(java.lang.String expression,
                                    javax.servlet.jsp.el.VariableResolver variableResolve)
Evaluates the specified value expression against the specified variable resolver.

invokeMethod(String, Class[], Object[]) should be used if the expression is a method expression.

Differs from evaluate in that it is guaranteed not to throw a PropertyNotFoundException for null properties.

setValue

void setValue(java.lang.String expression,
              java.lang.Object value)
Sets the value of the specified expression. The expression resolve to a JavaBean property.

setValue

void setValue(java.lang.String expression,
              java.lang.Object value,
              javax.servlet.jsp.el.VariableResolver variableResolver)
Sets the value of the specified expression. The expression resolve to a JavaBean property.

getVariableResolver

javax.servlet.jsp.el.VariableResolver getVariableResolver()
Get the default variable resolver to be used while resolving expressions with this evaluator.
